title: Frustrated, lying on floors, confused: Videos capture chaos as IndiGo cancels 500+ flights; watch
text: Frustrated, lying on floors, confused: Videos capture chaos as IndiGo cancels 500+ flights; watch India's aviation sector faced a severe meltdown as IndiGo cancelled over 400 flights, leaving thousands stranded and airports in chaos. Passengers endured long waits and exorbitant fares on other airlines due to the crisis, triggered by cabin crew shortages. IndiGo expects full operational recovery only by February 2026, highlighting a significant disruption.
